description: The Atom Vest is a proven performer across a range of seasons, landscapes and activities. Elevated with advanced insulation and material technologies, this versatile vest delivers its best, most versatile performance ever. Coreloft™ Compact synthetic insulation retains warmth if wet and withstands years of packing and unpacking, and the breathable, durable Tyono™ 20 shell resists wind and light weather. Stretch fleece side panels aid ventilation and freedom, and the entire vest packs into its own pocket.
name: Arcteryx Atom Vest - Mens

specs.value: Tyono™ 20 denier shell with FC0 DWR treatment - 100% nylon
Dope Permeair™ 20D - 100% nylon - Dope Dyed, bluesign Approved Material (select colours)
